Dated: 05/03/2015

ircular no. ~ 03/2015,

Subject:

‘arry-on baggage tags.

As per AVSEC Order 02/2000 dated 17/05/2000, the carry-on baggage tags are required
to be stamped after pre-embarkation security check by the ASG / APSU. It is observed that
many passengers do not carry the cabin baggage tags from the check-in counters and they have
to come back from security check points to check-in counters again for the same.

2. In view of the above, all airlines operating at a particular airport will also provide
sufficient cabin baggage tags at the Pre-Embarkation Security Check (PESC) points before
sereening in order to facilitate the passengers. ASG/APSU will coordinate with airline
operators so that passengers do not face any problem in getting the cabin baggage tag at the
PESC points before screening.

(R.N. Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
For Commissioner of Security (CA)

Distribution as per list attached / overleaf:
